ygData.messageBody:
Wrong, the server would still make the calculation... your items are
stored on the server along with your character information. If you
stop the client or tamper with the messages sent to the server about
dropping/trading, the server will make the appropriate corrections.
If your items were stored locally, this would be a way of duping, but
it isn't the case.
